tool_description: Validates alternative text for images, checking for presence, quality, and WCAG compliance of alt attributes.

html_content.description: HTML content containing images to validate

check_decorative.description: Whether to flag decorative images without empty alt attributes

min_alt_length.description: Minimum character length for meaningful alt text (1-20)

error_messages: Invalid HTML content: Provide valid HTML containing image elements.
Invalid length parameters: min_alt_length must be 1-20, max_alt_length must be 50-250, and min < max.
usage: Provide HTML content to scan all img elements for alt text compliance. Configure length limits and decorative image checking as needed.

missing_alt.description: Number of images missing alt attributes

empty_alt.description: Number of images with empty alt attributes

violations.description: List of specific alt text violations found

compliance_score.description: Percentage compliance score for image alt text
